summary: This film captures the criminal behavior of two young Copacabana thugs (the "cafajestes"). The two plan a blackmail coup against a rich old man, using nude pictures of a lady on a deserted ... See full summary »
cast: Per Aabel|Norma Bengell|Hugo Carvana|Lucy de Carvalho|Germana de Lamare|Marina Ferraz|Daniel Filho|Glauce Rocha|Aline Silva|Fátima Somer|Jece Valadão
title: Os Cafajestes
